name: Odin Language Support
description: Adds the Odin language support and tools.

release.description: The Odin release version to install. 'latest' for latest official release, 'master' for GitHub master.

os.description: The target operating system (when downloading, not compiling.

arch.description: The target architecture (when downloading, not compiling.

examples.description: Whether to install the Odin example projects.

examples-path.description: The path where the Odin example projects will be installed.

ols-create-config.description: Whether to create ant OLS configuration file.

ols-create-format.description: Whether to create ant OLS format file.
